Ingredients.1: 1 tablespoon sea salt (such as Diamond Crystal®), divided

Ingredients.5: 1 teaspoon olive oil, or more as needed

Ingredients.7: 24  pita chips, or more to taste

Ingredients.8: 24  cherry tomatoes, or more to taste

Ingredients.9: 24  basil leaves, or more to taste

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.2: Sprinkle 2 teaspoons salt over eggplant rounds in colander; allow to drain at least 30 minutes. Rinse salt off the eggplant.

Directions.3: Spread bread crumbs into a shallow bowl and beat egg in a separate bowl. Dip eggplant into egg, allowing excess egg to drip off the eggplant; press into bread crumbs until eggplant slices are evenly coated on both sides.

Directions.4: Arrange coated eggplant on a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 10 minutes.

Directions.6: Mix remaining 1 teaspoon salt with ricotta cheese in a bowl. Spoon ricotta cheese mixture onto each eggplant.

Directions.7: Bake eggplant in the oven until cheese is heated through, 5 to 7 minutes.

Directions.8: Place 1 eggplant slice onto each pita chip; top with a cherry tomato and basil leaf.
